snippet: Pfc. Bradley Manning showed behavior that could have been a warning that he was unsuitable to serve as an intelligence analyst, his lawyer said in a sentencing hearing.
abstract: Lawyer for Pfc Bradley Manning says at sentencing hearing that his client showed behavior that could have been a warning that he was unsuitable to serve as an intelligence analyst; Manning has been convicted of giving classified documents to WikiLeaks.
lead_paragraph: Pfc. Bradley Manning showed behavior that could have been a warning that he was unsuitable to serve as an intelligence analyst, his lawyer said in a sentencing hearing.

headline.main: Manning’s Lawyer Says Report Was Warning Sign
headline.print_headline: Manning’s Lawyer Says Report Was Warning Sign
